summary: THE REAR HATCH GLASS HAS A DESTINATION LINE ABOUT 2 INCHES DOWN FROM THE TOP OF GLASS THAT RUNS THE FULL WIDTH OF THE GLASS. THE DEALERSHIP HAS REPLACED IT 2 TIMES AND ALL HAVE THE SAME DEFECT. AFTER THE SECOND GLASS REPLACED I TOOK IT TO A GLASS SHOP.  THEY VERIFIED IT HAS DEFECT LINE IN GLASS. DEFECT PRESENT AT ALL TIMES.
